text: Birdene bolsa ozge ultka tise berede baska jerge barsa kolinan tuk kelmeitin kazakpizgoi

It nege oz egesin tisteidi toigannan kein tisteidi nanin jep suin iwip kutirip ketipti bas kotere almaitin dai basil basip janwip tastau kerek
Qutirgan bul dungandar politsiyanin ozin urib jurgoy
